name: Shape Up
description:
Go to Xbox Live on your console to download the free trial. Tired of going to the gym and repeating the same boring workout routine? Good news – getting fit just got fun. Introducing Shape Up, a video game for Xbox One, where every workout is a game. The more fun you have, the more you’ll want to work out. And the best part is, working out with Shape Up is 25% more effective than working out alone. 

The downloadable version of this game supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Swedish, Turkish, Japanese, Korean, Chinese.
